markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Witch Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5100) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 222 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Witch](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=217)

**Prerequisites**
[Witch Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5099)

</column>

---

You gain the [spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2132). Each time you gain a spell slot of a new rank from the witch archetype, add two common spells of that rank to your familiar.

<title level="2">Basic Witch Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Expert Witch Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5104), [Patron's Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=5103)
name: Basic Witch Spellcasting
